about_the_game:
ASTON: Find Hidden Numbers and Crack the Code to Escape

Are you ready to put your puzzle-solving skills to the test? Embark on an exciting adventure where you must uncover hidden numbers scattered throughout the room to unlock the code and make your escape!

Challenge yourself as you scour every nook and cranny of the room, deciphering clues and piecing together the mystery. Each hidden number brings you one step closer to freedom, but beware — the clock is ticking!

Features:

Immersive room environment with intricate details to explore.
Challenging puzzles and brain teasers to keep you engaged.
Hidden numbers cleverly integrated into the surroundings.
Race against time to crack the code and escape before it's too late.
Do you have what it takes to unravel the secrets of the room and secure your freedom? Find out now in ASTON!

name: Aston

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 or higher
  • Processor: 5th gen i5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1050 or higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • VR Support: -
  • Additional Notes: -

short_description: The aim of the game is to find the passwords of the encrypted doors in the rooms and finish the game.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Azerbaijani*, Bangla*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Catalan*, Cherokee*, Croatian*, Dari*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Icelandic*, Igbo*, Irish*, K'iche'*, Kannada*, Kazakh*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Konkani*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Persian*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Quechua*, Scots*, Serbian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Urdu*, Uyghur*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Xhosa*, Yoruba*, Zulu*
